body:
for me it was always about that ephemeral connection to a few individuals on a post and comment by post and comment basis, I neither expected Ruqqus to end nor to last forever

and connect temporarily, many of us did
body_html:
for me it was always about that ephemeral connection to a few individuals on a post and comment by post and comment basis, I neither expected Ruqqus to end nor to last forever

and connect temporarily, many of us did

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body: Meh I feel cheated and ripped off because I bought a bunch of coins. Wouldn’t have done that if I had a suspicion that I was being used as a free tester for a new software platform.
body_html: Meh I feel cheated and ripped off because I bought a bunch of coins. Wouldn’t have done that if I had a suspicion that I was being used as a free tester for a new software platform.

body:
I have mixed emotions. My disappointment in the admins is immeasurable, but I'm even more disappointed in myself for not seeing this coming sooner. Rose colored glasses, as the saying goes. I'm sorry to see it go, but it opened my eyes to my own naïveté in thinking that it would last. I'm just sick and tired of being sick and tired of websites making false promises.

See you all on the flipside.
body_html:
I have mixed emotions. My disappointment in the admins is immeasurable, but I'm even more disappointed in myself for not seeing this coming sooner. Rose colored glasses, as the saying goes. I'm sorry to see it go, but it opened my eyes to my own naïveté in thinking that it would last. I'm just sick and tired of being sick and tired of websites making false promises.

See you all on the flipside.

body: It had problems as far back as right after I joined but it was at least usable and had a lot of diversity.

author.bio: Unironic Anarcho-Monarchist. I also collect stamps.

body:
I have enjoyed Ruqqus so far. Good, open discussions, good memes. But I always knew it would come to this. Not this quickly, however. I came to Ruqqus after the infamous "Ban Monday" on R*ddit during the summer of 2020, so I have learnt not to get too attached to any platform. 

I don't regret anything. Time well spent, connections made, things learnt. Now we move on to the next one. Rinse and repeat. And where ever that might be, I hope to see you all there as well!
body_html:
I have enjoyed Ruqqus so far. Good, open discussions, good memes. But I always knew it would come to this. Not this quickly, however. I came to Ruqqus after the infamous "Ban Monday" on R*ddit during the summer of 2020, so I have learnt not to get too attached to any platform.

I don't regret anything. Time well spent, connections made, things learnt. Now we move on to the next one. Rinse and repeat. And where ever that might be, I hope to see you all there as well!
